NamespaceCreateOrUpdateParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate Namespace operation.

value.description: Result of the List Namespace operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of Namespaces

NamespaceListResult.description: The response of the List Namespace operation.

createdAt.description: The time the namespace was created.

updatedAt.description: The time the namespace was updated.

serviceBusEndpoint.description: Endpoint you can use to perform ServiceBus operations.

createACSNamespace.description: Indicates whether to create ACS namespace.

enabled.description: Specifies whether this instance is enabled.

tier.description: The tier of this particular SKU

SharedAccessAuthorizationRuleCreateOrUpd.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate  AuthorizationRules.

value.description: Result of the List AuthorizationRules operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of AuthorizationRules

SharedAccessAuthorizationRuleListResult.description: The response of the List Namespace operation.

rights.description: The rights associated with the rule.

primaryConnectionString.description: PrimaryConnectionString of the created Namespace AuthorizationRule.

secondaryConnectionString.description: SecondaryConnectionString of the created Namespace AuthorizationRule

primaryKey.description: A base64-encoded 256-bit primary key for signing and validating the SAS token

secondaryKey.description: A base64-encoded 256-bit primary key for signing and validating the SAS token

keyName.description: A string that describes the authorization rule

Policykey.description: Key that needs to be regenerated .

RegenerateKeysParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Regenerate Auth Rule.

EventHubCreateOrUpdateParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate EventHub operation.

createdAt.description: Exact time the Event was created.

messageRetentionInDays.description: Number of days to retain the events for this Event Hub.

partitionCount.description: Number of partitions created for EventHub.

partitionIds.description: Current number of shards on the Event Hub.

status.description: Enumerates the possible values for the status of the EventHub.

updatedAt.description: The exact time the message has been updated.

value.description: Result of the List EventHub operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of EventHub

EventHubListResult.description: The response of the List EventHub operation.

eventHubPath.description: The path of the event hub.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of Consumer Group

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
